name: ChinaEU
goal: ChinaEU is a business-led international association aimed at intensifying joint research and project-based business cooperation between China and Europe and fostering mutual investments in Internet, Telecom and Hi-tech sectors. ChinaEU provides an informal platform for constructive dialogue among industry leaders and top-level representatives of European Institutions and the Chinese Government.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, External Relations, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
A connected Digital Single Market

EU-China Investment Negotiations

Modernisation of Trade Defence Instruments

Screening of FDI into the EU
